posts.post_content:
Offered here are 3  1913 Fatima T200 Team Cards. Brooklyn with HOF's Wheat and Stengel, Cincinnati with HOF's Tinker and Mordecai Brown  and Washington with HOF Walter Johnson and Black Sox Gandil . Prices below . Please add 8.00 for a flat rate usps box 
Brooklyn sold
Cincinnati sold
Washington sold
Descriptions below

Brooklyn has a crease next to Stengel running down to the bottom which doesnt impact the photo much and is mostly visible when turning the card at an angle or looking under magnification. There is a second wrinkle or crack in the paper that runs next to Meyers and isnt that noticeable unless you turn the card at an angle
I'll take Cincy per our PMs.
Weekend end discount on the 2 remaining
